ing: 1 (1 ounce) package sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "A tasty cream pie with pineapple and pecans. You can use fat-free milk and whipped topping to make this dessert extra low-cal."
ins: In a medium bowl, whisk together pudding mix and milk. Fold in pineapple, whipped topping, and pecans. Pour mixture into prepared crust. Chill at least 2 hours before serving.
